scripts.install:all: npm --prefix admin install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix shop install
scripts.start:simple: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.restart: npm run stop-all && sleep 2 && npm run start
scripts.dev:restart: npm run stop-all && sleep 2 && npm run dev:all
scripts.restart:backend: npm run stop:backend && sleep 2 && npm run start:backend
scripts.restart:frontend: npm run stop:frontend && sleep 2 && npm run start:frontend
